Topic: Alema Hall (Named after G.N. Alema one of the founding founders)
Ellen Hall (Named after Ellen House the first building of the school in James Town)
Halm Addo Hall (Named after J.A. Halm-Addo a founding father)
Nana Wereko Ampem II Hall (Named after the distinguished alumnus and traditional ruler)
